card.name: Akroma, Angel of Fury
card.text: Akroma, Angel of Fury can't be countered. Flying, trample, protection from white and from blue {R}: Akroma, Angel of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Morph {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

card.name: Akroma's Vengeance
card.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments. Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
card.text: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.text: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

card.name: Ball Lightning
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.) Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

card.name: Bident of Thassa
card.text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. {1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.text: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

card.name: Blue Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target red spell. • Destroy target red permanent.

card.name: Chalice of the Void
card.text: Chalice of the Void enters the battlefield with X charge counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Chalice of the Void, counter that spell.

card.name: Cursecatcher
card.text: Sacrifice Cursecatcher: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

card.name: Darien, King of Kjeldor
card.text: Whenever you're dealt damage, you may create that many 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Doomsday
card.text: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Eidolon of the Great Revel
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell with converted mana cost 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

card.name: Eladamri's Call
card.text: Search your library for a creature card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ensnaring Bridge
card.text: Creatures with power greater than the number of cards in your hand can't attack.

card.name: Fierce Empath
card.text: When Fierce Empath enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Flash
card.text: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

card.name: Giant Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Gisela, Blade of Goldnight
card.text: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

card.name: Goblin War Drums
card.text: Creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Hanna, Ship's Navigator
card.text: {1}{W}{U}, {T}: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Imperial Recruiter
card.text: When Imperial Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for a creature card with power 2 or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
card.text: +2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library. 0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order. -1: Return target creature to its owner's hand. -12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles his or her hand into his or her library.

card.name: Kor Firewalker
card.text: Protection from red Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.

card.name: Living Death
card.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Living Wish
card.text: You may choose a creature or land card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Living Wish.

card.name: Magus of the Wheel
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Wheel: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

card.name: Murder
card.text: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.text: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind deals 1 damage to target creature or player. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Phyrexian Obliterator
card.text: Trample Whenever a source deals damage to Phyrexian Obliterator, that source's controller sacrifices that many permanents.

card.name: Pillage
card.text: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Prossh, Skyraider of Kher
card.text: Flying When you cast Prossh, Skyraider of Kher, create X 0/1 red Kobold creature tokens named Kobolds of Kher Keep, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast Prossh. Sacrifice another creature: Prossh gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Protean Hulk
card.text: When Protean Hulk dies, search your library for any number of creature cards with total converted mana cost 6 or less and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Red Elemental Blast
card.text: Choose one - • Counter target blue spell. • Destroy target blue permanent.

card.name: Rishadan Port
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

card.name: Ruric Thar, the Unbowed
card.text: Vigilance, reach Ruric Thar, the Unbowed attacks each combat if able. Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, Ruric Thar deals 6 damage to that player.

card.name: Sundering Titan
card.text: When Sundering Titan enters the battlefield or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

card.name: Thalia, Guardian of Thraben
card.text: First strike Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.

card.name: Undead Gladiator
card.text: {1}{B}, Discard a card: Return Undead Gladiator from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep. Cycling {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vindicate
card.text: Destroy target permanent.

card.name: Willbender
card.text: Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

card.name: Zombify
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
